title: Funny thing I saw on the random games page
body:
http://prntscr.com/6dc6l1

The names on the right though. Pretty funny xD

replies.body: I guess that team must have some good roots
I'm kinda dissapointed that the team only had one champion with a root. :(
True they need to root out this problem in their team comp so then their team work will bare fruit if they want their chances of winning to grow

I don't want to be sappy, but you're right - It's important to seed your team with the right champions. Otherwise, yew'll generally have problems with your fronds lives being truncated by the enemy team.

I do agree that their team work needs to be spruced up, otherwise they will be barked at by each other and won't be given a pine opportunity to have their team work flower. In the end they will go nuts if this happens.
Man, that image was a tree-t.
If a tree feeds their lane opponent, does anyone complain?

Only if it falls in the ~~fores~~ jungle without any ears. 

I think.
The trees lost. GGWP trees not strong enough. {{item:3070}}
